TopicTitle: Any KSP_Data editor thats compatible with U5?

Articles.Content:
Well as the title says, i have a few textures id like to replace in the stock game but id rather do it by editing the sharedassets#.assets files as desired instead of using mods.

Does anyone know of a utility that allows me to replace textures in unity assets files?  In the past there was something called Unity Assets Explorer, but that one is pretty much dead as of now (doesnt work with 1.1.3 or any of the post 1.0.5 games).  Help with this regard would be greatly appreciated as its very hard to mod anything withotu the proper tools

Hi Panzer1b, I don't think there's any tools for Unity5 asset files that aren't Unity itself, maybe try the Unity site.

Please remember that Squad code and assets within the Unity asset files are Squad property, but creating your own asset files should work, they might even load faster.
